text: Gettin' Down On It is the first full-length album by the Fort Wayne, Indiana, blues rock duo Left Lane Cruiser. The album was released through Hillgrass Bluebilly on July 26, 2006 and re-released on February 26, 2007. ==Track listing== ==References== == External links == * * Category:2006 debut albums Category:Left Lane Cruiser albums
title: Gettin' Down On It
